title: LF People to play with EST
body:
Hey guys,

I'm just looking for some people to add to my friends list that play regularly.   I am pretty easy going, never toxic and am a police officer by trade.   Currently on leave till next week so I'm keen to play some games.  Norms or ranked I'm easy.   Defs looking to climb out of bronze.   

Add my summoner and pst me for a game or three !   (Flashboi).

I have skype and I am happy to hop on when we play...
